## NgwFeatureItemResponse.toGeojson() method

To get GeoJson from ngw item

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toGeojson(): CancelablePromise<Feature<G, F>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

CancelablePromise&lt;Feature&lt;G, F&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

if geometry is not available (see [NgwFeatureRequestOptions.geom](./ngw-kit.ngwfeaturerequestoptions.geom.md)<!-- -->), this method will return it anyway
